title: Gianluca95
author: Gianluca95
content: Wintomato is looking for 80 users (40 Full Member and Sr. Member, 40 Hero Member/Legendary Member) to test their platform and leave here a little review on your experience. You have to make some bets (Wager 20x) in way to withdraw amount required (5$ for Full Member and Sr.Member, 10$ for Hero/Legendary  Member). Each review should contain positive and negative points (also, it is valid if you have only positive or only negative points), this will be used from wintomato to improve platform where necessary.In way to partecipate, please, fill this form:QuoteBitcointalk Username:Wintomato Username:Test the gameWrite a small review here(edit your application post for this)Rules1 application per account, users caught cheating the campaign with multiple accounts will be given neg trust and kicked off.Must reach a wager of 20x before requesting a WithdrawMust edit your application post and write a small reviewCheck here if you've been accepted: *I am only managing the campaign. I am not affiliated with this service. I just look at your posts.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: I wonder how this can be a review campaign where the payment is only paid with such free bet or bonus money.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on August 01, 2022, 02:15:21 PMI wonder how this can be a review campaign where the payment is only paid with such free bet or bonus money.This review campaign works in this way. You receive funds between 5 and 10$ in way to try platform, if you reach wager, you can withdraw. It could be good because if you reach that wager requirement you can withdraw funds. Also other sites has made review campaign in this way. Purpose of this campaign is to let user try this platform without spending money, and not for earning. If they reach requirement, well for them.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on August 01, 2022, 02:17:59 PMQuote from: Despairo on August 01, 2022, 02:15:21 PMI wonder how this can be a review campaign where the payment is only paid with such free bet or bonus money.This review campaign works in this way. You receive funds between 5 and 10$ in way to try platform, if you reach wager, you can withdraw. It could be good because if you reach that wager requirement you can withdraw funds. Also other sites has made review campaign in this way. Purpose of this campaign is to let user try this platform without spending money, and not for earning. If they reach requirement, well for them.But what if one of the members subscribed and did not write the review here? How will you react? What would you expect from a user who participates in this campaign and loses that free bonus? What would motivate him to write an evaluation? Wouldn't he be able to argue for any reason and withdraw from the campaign? I didn't see a review campaign before that is paying participants with free bonus.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on August 01, 2022, 06:52:14 PMWhat would you expect from a user who participates in this campaign and loses that free bonus? What would motivate him to write an evaluation? Wouldn't he be able to argue for any reason and withdraw from the campaign? I'd worry more about the quality of those reviews and the lack of incentives for users to write good ones as I see it.I guess they do have to pay in advance of a review to seem like the reviews are accurate but there are probably better ways to do this (either pay out a certain amount of people or offer a higher bonus - the higher bonus could come with a higher withdraw requirement I just don't think $5 being lost by someone is much of an incentive to write a review).

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: this campaign is more like a welcome bonus campaign than a review. Users will get some money just enough to try this casino. Writing a review can be considered a gift, I am not sure that it is possible to find a copywriter who will write something meaningful for $5.Quote from: jackg on August 01, 2022, 07:01:35 PMI guess they do have to pay in advance of a review to seem like the reviews are accurate but there are probably better ways to do this (either pay out a certain amount of people or offer a higher bonus - the higher bonus could come with a higher withdraw requirement I just don't think $5 being lost by someone is much of an incentive to write a review). I would also say that different bonuses depending on the forum rank are probably not the happiest solution. I don't see why a full member can't write a good review of a gambling site just like a legendary member.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 01, 2022, 07:44:31 PMthis campaign is more like a welcome bonus campaign than a review. Users will get some money just enough to try this casino. Writing a review can be considered a gift, I am not sure that it is possible to find a copywriter who will write something meaningful for $5.Quote from: jackg on August 01, 2022, 07:01:35 PMI guess they do have to pay in advance of a review to seem like the reviews are accurate but there are probably better ways to do this (either pay out a certain amount of people or offer a higher bonus - the higher bonus could come with a higher withdraw requirement I just don't think $5 being lost by someone is much of an incentive to write a review). I would also say that different bonuses depending on the forum rank are probably not the happiest solution. I don't see why a full member can't write a good review of a gambling site just like a legendary member.As written, this campaign has born with the goal to let everyone join platform and then write a short review/comment about that. This campaign hasn’t any advertising goal but wants only to let user try this platform and leave here a short review, and for me, this seems a good deal, considering that you haven’t to submit any deposits and at the same time you can win a good amount of money in the various available game.PS: Betnomi review campaign has offered 5$ to each partecipant in the past and it went good.

comments.author: Hamich124D
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 01, 2022, 07:44:31 PMthis campaign is more like a welcome bonus campaign than a review. Users will get some money just enough to try this casino. Writing a review can be considered a gift, I am not sure that it is possible to find a copywriter who will write something meaningful for $5.It's not 5$ but rather a chance of getting 5$ after completing the 20x rollover requirement, which is very unlikely that someone can do it to say the least..OP if you want some feedback to your casino you can simply post about it in the gambling section, im sure many people will be willing to test out the website and give their honest feedback for free, it's just that calling it a "review campaign" where nothing will actualy be given to the reviewers is kinda deceiving imo.

comments.author: fiulpro
comments.created_time: August 01, 2022, 11:13:06 PMLast edit: August 03, 2022, 01:23:43 PM by fiulpro
comments.body: The campain will basically pay you if you are lucky enough to survive the wager of *20, they have not mentioned anywhere the minimum amount you can wager thus you can choose the minimum on the site as well and keep on doing it till you reach *20 ! So if you are lucky enough this will indeed pay you, but you must understand that these kinds of testing is done ✅ by most companies, in the past as well and they usually help loads in giving right information thus leaving a honest review must be the job of the participants, appreciate a company trying to test it out first. Bitcointalk Username: fiulpro Wintomato Username: fiulpro Test the gameWrite a small review here(edit your application post for this)*Pending* Here is my review: 1. The site worked fine, the device used was an android but there were slight issues since due to the chat option being on the bottom left some buttons were inaccessible. For example :  2. The server kept on disconnecting in mines which is one of my favourite games ! Which I do understand can be due to my network connection but all other games were working fine as well therefore i had no problem in other ones. 3. The best part was seeing some interesting games which honestly I have not seen on many platforms but I was playing demo mode in this : 4. Please do understand that am a very anxious better so for me the best game is _DICE_ and for that I usually look for few options like : 1. Ability to change it manually, losses and ranges 2. Minimum bet amount usually being fair Therefore this is my personal favourite game anywhere I played there, there was no problem at all, I love the chimes that comes when you win, I did loose ofc but only 3 times, I also wagered with the full amount provided, which turned out to be a blessing as well and I managed to get out safe ! Was able to bet 37× was supposed to do it 22× but it was quite addictive The game's seed was there as well at the bottom which helped me tremendously since for me it's good that there is an easy way to change it in a click. Finally the long awaited *withdrawal* On entering the address it popped out ' invalid address ' when I entered the right doge address but I clicked to see if that would work/not work, which I don't know if the money is lost forever but I would update regarding that. Best things was : Extra security available on withdrawalFee was amazing only 5 DOGE, kudos for that Loved the logo, site was engaging especially the tomato man on the left top side. Deposit bonuses available with the free spins as well but minimum amount to deposit is 20$ and minimum withdrawal is 15$ so I think that's also an amazing chance to get loads of free spins with it. P.s. I think the wager was 20 bets made, was it not ?? If not am willing to deposit 10$ again but ofc in btc and continue the betting till I reach 20*10? But I think it was 20 times, but seeing the people commenting a bit in a dilemma PS2 Update : Yes you do need to have at least 200$ to have a valid withdrawal request, was not sure talked with the manager and he was helpful regarding the cancellation of the invalid withdrawal thus let's see if I can try and win 200$ ! Update : was able to reach *2 that's all, put it all in on dice 🎲 with lowest possible risk but lost it all. Also changed the seed, randomized it before I put all of it on the bet !

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on August 01, 2022, 09:42:38 PMAs written, this campaign has born with the goal to let everyone join platform and then write a short review/comment about that. This campaign hasn’t any advertising goal but wants only to let user try this platform and leave here a short review, and for me, this seems a good deal, considering that you haven’t to submit any deposits and at the same time you can win a good amount of money in the various available game.PS: Betnomi review campaign has offered 5$ to each partecipant in the past and it went good. I guess you are right, I had something else in mind, just remember one $5 casino feedback campaign Write a short crypto casino feedback [Paying $5 directly to your BTC wallet] , only 150 words text. I'm not sure how much effective and useful feedback can be expected in 100-150 words.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: fiulpro on August 01, 2022, 11:13:06 PMThe campain will basically pay you if you are lucky enough to survive the wager of *20, they have not mentioned anywhere the minimum amount you can wager thus you can choose the minimum on the site as well and keep on doing it till you reach *20 ! So if you are lucky enough this will indeed pay you, but you must understand that these kinds of testing is done ✅ by most companies, in the past as well and they usually help loads in giving right information thus leaving a honest review must be the job of the participants, appreciate a company trying to test it out first. Bitcointalk Username: fiulpro Wintomato Username: fiulpro Test the gameWrite a small review here(edit your application post for this)*Pending* Credited. Thanks.

comments.author: Reid
comments.created_time: August 02, 2022, 02:46:18 PMLast edit: August 04, 2022, 10:28:41 AM by Reid
comments.body: Let's do this.  Bitcointalk Username: ReidWintomato Username: Reid2022Test the gameWrite a small review here(edit your application post for this)(for update)Pros: I like that the game will open a new window to let you play so that the chatbox will stay on the sidebar. Rain was also fun to see. Then the jackpot questions with high rewards, hoping to reach level 2 so I can join.Cons:Whenever I want to check my profile just to see how much experience was being given, the game window will also close and the auto function will stop. Is there a way that whenever we just check our profile it will just replace whatever is open in the sidebar? So that the game will keep on even if you are checking your stats.It seems like it's also having problems when you switch to a new tab or a new window while in auto mode. There's also a time I was disconnected because I was not checking back on the wintomato window.I will add more if I see other details.

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on August 01, 2022, 02:10:24 PMMust reach a wager of 20x before requesting a WithdrawDo I understand correctly that I have to write a review and wager the $10 I get 20x before I can make a withdrawal?That looks like it is nearly impossible to make a payout at all. This has little to do with a review campaign. Why write a review when the chances of getting paid for it are almost zero?

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.created_time: August 02, 2022, 03:46:22 PMLast edit: August 02, 2022, 04:11:22 PM by YOSHIE
comments.body: Isn't the bonus review provided by the site for free, without betting requirements, Is not that reviewing the web about the advantages and disadvantages of the site, if yes, for $5 / $10, plus 20x the stake, the final value is the same as zero for users who review the wintomato.com site, in my opinion $5 without any rules, maybe I value, many are reluctant to review.In my opinion, it's better to change some rules for Wintomato.com review users, maybe the review bonus value is added, the 20x betting rule is removed, what if you propose to the wintomato.com team to provide a bonus review to participants, without betting rules, let them decide for themselves, essentially they should leave positive and negative reviews in this thread, regardless they follow the 20x rule.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.created_time: August 02, 2022, 04:26:47 PMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 11:26:42 PM by darkangel11
comments.body: Quote from: bullrun2020bro on August 02, 2022, 02:58:13 PMQuote from: Gianluca95 on August 01, 2022, 02:10:24 PMMust reach a wager of 20x before requesting a WithdrawDo I understand correctly that I have to write a review and wager the $10 I get 20x before I can make a withdrawal?That looks like it is nearly impossible to make a payout at all. This has little to do with a review campaign. Why write a review when the chances of getting paid for it are almost zero?This isn't a way for users to make money, but rather a way to test the games for free. You get some money credited and you can freely lose it without any regrets. How is that bad? Treat it like a lottery ticket with a 1/100 chance to win. You probably won't win anything, but you can't lose either. I'll try it out. Bitcointalk Username: darkangel11Wintomato Username: darkangel11The things that I've noticed while browsing: In the FAQ it states: QuoteWhat languages is WinTomato available in?Currently, the site is available in three distinctive languages which are English, Russian and Georgian, One can easily change it by clicking on the national flag of the language which can be found on the site’s top right corner at all times.Yet, in the language change there are only English and Russian options. So, I guess Georgian was planned but not added yet?  There's a casino forum and you can find a link to it on the site. I've found a month old thread there with an issue that hasn't been answered by anyone.https://coinfolk.net/topic/541/1st-2nd-3rd-deposit-bonus-issueI like the site for now. It's simple and works well. For now I've spent some time playing crash, plinko and slots. While crash and plinko worked fine for me with about 50% W/L ratio, slots rolled 8 losses in a row for me which basically ended my free bonus in less than a minute  I got some free money from rain. Not much, something like 1 USD worth of coins, but that's always a free roll or two. One thing I don't understand. Why the minimum withdrawal is 15$ with coins that cost less than 1 USD in fees to send across the blockchain? It doesn't make sense to allow people to deposit $10 worth of coins, but not to allow them to withdraw it unless they win another $5.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Since I like gambling anyway, I might as well give your casino a try. But before that I would like to ask a few questions.According to Wintomato's terms of service, the minimum withdrawal amount per transaction is €10. Is that correct? source: https://coinfolk.net/topic/476/t-c-english?_=1659462908300&lang=en-USSo if I get $5 to test the platform and manage to complete the 20x rollover requirement, I still won't be able to withdraw the funds since the amount is less than €10?And another question, why do you discriminate based on forum rank? Sr. and Full Members can write just as good reviews as higher ranked members.Quote from: Gianluca95 on August 01, 2022, 09:42:38 PMPS: Betnomi review campaign has offered 5$ to each partecipant in the past and it went good. That's true, but Betnomi didn't ask for 20x rollover requirement, but 20 bets. Since you already copied most of the conditions from their campaign anyway, you might as well copy this one too.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on August 02, 2022, 07:42:42 PMSince I like gambling anyway, I might as well give your casino a try. But before that I would like to ask a few questions.According to Wintomato's terms of service, the minimum withdrawal amount per transaction is €10. Is that correct? source: https://coinfolk.net/topic/476/t-c-english?_=1659462908300&lang=en-USSo if I get $5 to test the platform and manage to complete the 20x rollover requirement, I still won't be able to withdraw the funds since the amount is less than €10?And another question, why do you discriminate based on forum rank? Sr. and Full Members can write just as good reviews as higher ranked members.Quote from: Gianluca95 on August 01, 2022, 09:42:38 PMPS: Betnomi review campaign has offered 5$ to each partecipant in the past and it went good. That's true, but Betnomi didn't ask for 20x rollover requirement, but 20 bets. Since you already copied most of the conditions from their campaign anyway, you might as well copy this one too.  Well, an higher rank means that a member has more experience than a newbie. Sure, it could be some case where a newbie can have more experience than a Legendary, but it is few.About withdraw funds, for this review campagn you can withdraw an amount less than 10€.About wager requirement, this review campaign doesn't born to let you earn, (for that we have a signature campaign, in this one earnings is secondary) but to let you join a free experience to wintomato in change of a short review (seems reasonable a comment in change of a freebet).Thanks. If you want to try platform you can also edit this comment and fill the form indicated on the OP.

comments.author: icalical
comments.created_time: August 03, 2022, 02:12:31 AMLast edit: August 04, 2022, 12:31:22 PM by icalical
comments.body: Waiting for the fund, wish me luckBitcointalk Username: icalicalWintomato Username: icalicalOk so this is my review QuoteI don't gamble that much and I only do sports-betting, but I think there is not much of a review I can do on the sports-betting part, nothing's wrong on the Sports Betting section, all the UI/UX was on Point. It also has some E-Sport betting it lacks some games that I usually bet on, like Valorant and Apex Legend. So, I hope more E-Sport will be added. For Casino and Games part, like I said that I only do sports-betting so I don't understand most of the games, I don't know how to play most of them. And Unfortunately Wintomato doesn't have 'how-to-play' section for any of their game, it make me hesitant to play most of their game, so I only play Dice and Crash the only thing that I know. I know that most of people who Gamble should already know how to play most of the Casino Games, but I think adding a brief and short 'how-to-play' section for some games is not much work to do. Other than that, the overall UI/UX, page-transition, and connection seems great and I never experience any lag. And I think some people already mention that you need to be at least Level 2 to join chatroom, and to level-up you need to collect point by either Wagering, Betting, or Joining Contest, but after I wager for several time, I don't get any point from it, so maybe something's wrong. I can't make any review about the withdrawal, since I lost all the money they gave me, lol

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.created_time: August 03, 2022, 02:26:23 AMLast edit: August 03, 2022, 02:51:35 PM by seoincorporation
comments.body: Bitcointalk Username: seoincorporationWintomato Username: BtcBossTest the gameI just tested the game with the $10, but wasn't able to make profit. Things that i Like:-Great chat with lot of rains-Nice and fast faucet-A big variety of games-Nice UXThings that i Dislike:-Terms and conditions are outside of the site.-Users who win big only can withdraw $10k/month*In cases when your balance is at least 10 times larger than the total sum of your deposits, you will be limited to € 5,000 (or currency equivalent) for withdrawal per month. In other cases the maximum withdrawal amount per month is € 10,000.-To use chat we need to be lvl 2 but can't find information about how to level up.-The roll-over for the promos is x30.In general i don't feel like this is the right site to win big, because we will be not able to withdraw all if we hit a big multiplier with a big amount. And this will become a problem in the future. Is about time to see a user complaining about a big win that can't be cashed out.But in general, you have a nice casino there, i wish you great luck.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.created_time: August 03, 2022, 05:19:17 AMLast edit: August 08, 2022, 07:39:36 PM by Franctoshi
comments.body: Really good we give it a trial and know how it works , I did register last week on the platform to try out how their games are, seem I didn't finish up because I was having a network issues on my side and haven't check back since then. Wintomato user name: FranctoshiBitcoin talk user name : FranctoshiYou can creditI'm going to win jackpot! Edit;My Experience so far on Wintomato.comPositive ExperienceCustomer/support services:First of all I started with reaching to customer/ Support service the experience good as I was attended immediately.CommunityDid check out on the community as well and they got good telegram group ,discord and forum where people discuss things concerned with the platform.Game experience:I did play the crash game and the sports games because those are the games I love and understand. Was deposited with 70 Doge worth $5 and after series of looses and winnings I increased my balance to 78 dog coins in my balance to continue playing and the experience was good like other platforms I have equally used.Deposit/withdrawal:They have various means of withdrawal process Bitcoin, ETH, USDT, Doge, Xrp  etc and bank withdrawal as well.Lastly I love the fact that they equally have the option where you can exchange one crypto to the other.Negative Experience. However they still got a little problem need to be worked on.1. Withdrawal limit should be reduced maybe somewhere between $5 -$10 2.Need to work on the stability of the site was playing my games and they went on mentainace, though I understand that is a new platform and they're still putting things together and could be as result of high influx of new customers registration and I don't know if they gave prior notice to that, but within few minutes the service was immediately restored and I continued playing my games.
